items.title: Sources: Spartans hire Fitzgerald on 5-year deal
items.description: Former Northwestern coach Pat Fitzgerald has signed a five-year contract to become the next head football coach at Michigan State, sources told ESPN.

items.title: Thielen cut to seek bigger role in last NFL season
items.description: The Vikings have waived Adam Thielen at the veteran wide receiver's request, the team announced Monday.
